mapper.select: SELECT l.USER_NO , l.SUB_NO , l.SERIAL_NUM , l.AC_DATE , l.SCORE , s.SUB_NAME , s.AREA , s.PUBLICATION FROM TBL_LICENSE l, TBL_SUBJECT s WHERE s.AREA IN ('정보화 영역','금융,회계영역','교육영역') AND l.SUB_NO = s.SUB_NO AND l.USER_NO = #{userNo} ORDER BY l.SUB_NO DESC
SELECT SUB_NO , SUB_NAME , AREA , PUBLICATION FROM TBL_SUBJECT WHERE AREA IN ('정보화 영역','금융,회계영역','교육영역') AND SUB_NO NOT IN (SELECT SUB_NO FROM TBL_LICENSE WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo}) ORDER BY SUB_NO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_LICENSE (SERIAL_NUM, AC_DATE, SCORE, SUB_NO, USER_NO, APPLY_NO) VALUES (#{serialNum}, #{acDate}, #{acScore}, #{subNo}, #{userNo}, #{applyNo})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TBL_LICENSE WHERE APPLY_NO = #{applyNo} AND USER_NO = #{userNo}
